channel.title: How to make a player drop a random artefact in pvp apon death - Paying 1-5 RSGP!
channel.description: Hey mopar, I have added artefacts I just need something to make the opponent your fighting drop a random artefact when they die. Help would be much appriciated - My teamviewer ID is 775 424 835 and pass 6862. Thanks! :o
